header.title: Guktie sijjiedehtedh jih utnedh programmem MacOS X:sne

body.note: Gosse saemien tjaeledh Mac:esne, tjoeverh dellie veeljedh Catalan (=noerhtesaemien), Basque (=julevsaemien) jallh Slovak (=Åarjelsaemien). Ij leah dïhte mijjen fåantoe, mohte MS:n fåantoe ahte nimhtie lea!

section.title: Divvunem veedtjedh
section.p: Veedtjh http://www.divvun.no/static_files/sami-proofing-tools.dmg jallh dænghkodh CD Saemiedigkeste, tel: +47 78 48 42 22.

section.title: Sijjiedehtedh
section.note: Jis edtjh orrestehtedh programmem voestes versjovneste mubpie versjovnese, dellie tjoeverh vaeltedh dam båeries versjovnem destie, aarebi dam orre mubpie versjovnem bïejh.
section.p: Jis Divvun-programmem edtjh sijjiedehtedh maahta programmem daestie veedtjedh http://www.divvun.no/static_files/sami-proofing-tools.dmgjallh maahtah CD:ste sijjiedehtedh.

section.title: Sijjiedehteme MacOS X:sne
section.p: 1. Gosse veedtjeme, dellie klaase rïhpese tjaelemebuertesne. Seamma klaase rïhpese aaj gosse CD lea gaervies. Daam vïskes borhtjem guektien aejkien diedtieh(sijjiedehtemepaahka):
2. DiedtiehFortsättguktie dellie dïhte programme aalka sijjiedehtedh
3. Jis ih leah jïjtje dïhte reerijinie, dellie dïhte guhte lea reerije tjoevere sijjiedehtemem dååhkesjehtedh:

img.alt: Installationen måste godkännas av en administratör

section.p: 4. Jis leah joe sijjiedahteme, dellie dov daelie Divvun-dïrregh dov daatovrisnie!

section.p: Jis edtjh buektiehtidh noerhtesaemien gïelesne tjaeledh, dle tjoeverh noerhtesaemien båaloebuertiem veedtjedh

section.title: Divvun Mac:esne utnedh
section.p: Gosse datne MS Office:m rïhpestamme, dle tjoerh daatovrem stïlledh saemien gïelesne staeriedidh.Dam darjoeh seamma vuekien mietie guktie MS Office 2004:sne jïh MS Office 2008:sne.

3. Veeljh gïelem Katalanska ( Catalan ) jis lea noerhtesaemien tjaalege, veeljh Baskiska ( Basque ) jis lea julevsaemien tjaalege , jallh veeljh Slovakiska ( Slovak ) jis lea åarjelsaemien tjaalege ( 1):

section.p: 5. Daelie maahtah aelkedh saemien tjaeledh jïh prograamme datnem viehkehte rïekteslaakan tjaeledh:

Ij leah Microsoft daen raajan naan sjïere dovtegem dorjeme guktie saemien gïelide Mac:esne dåarjelidh, jïlhts dovtege MS Office:ese jïh Windows:ese gååvnese. Håhkoe lea ahte båetijebiejjide versjovnh MS Office:ese jïh Mac:ese aaj daam dovtegem åadtjoeh. Daen raajan tjoeveribie saemien gïelide jeatjah gïeline tjïelkestidh mah gååvnesieh MS Office:sne.

ul.li: Open the folder DivvunTools in the /Library folder:
Run the Remove Divvun for Office application in the subfolder for the application you want to remove Divvun from, and confirm that you want to remove Divvun when asked:
If it is the last or only Divvun installation, the whole folder DivvunTools will be removed as well.
Open the folder SamiProofingTools in the Applications folder:
Run (one of) the Remove SamiProofingTools application(s). Click OK when done:
Manually delete the folder SamiProofingTools if it isn't automatically deleted
